our finished projects

Tailored Solutions for Your Vision

Discover How Our Services Bring Your Establishment to Life

Design Planning

Concept Development for Urban Cafe

  • Description:

    Collaborating with the client, we conceptualized a modern urban cafe with industrial-chic elements. The design incorporated exposed brick walls, sleek metal fixtures, and reclaimed wood accents, creating a trendy yet welcoming atmosphere.

  • Effect:

    The result was a hip and inviting space that attracted a young, urban clientele seeking a stylish spot to enjoy specialty coffee and artisanal pastries.

Design Planning

Space Planning for Fine Dining Restaurant

  • Description:

    Working closely with the restaurant owner, we optimized the layout of a fine dining establishment to maximize seating capacity while maintaining an intimate ambiance. Careful consideration was given to table placement, traffic flow, and sightlines to ensure a seamless dining experience.

  • Effect:

    The redesigned space enhanced the restaurant's efficiency and guest satisfaction, leading to increased reservations and positive reviews praising the comfortable and elegant dining environment.

Procurement

Sourcing of Furniture for Cozy Bistro

  • Description:

    We curated a selection of furniture pieces for a cozy bistro, focusing on comfort, durability, and aesthetic appeal. Our procurement team sourced high-quality chairs, tables, and banquettes that complemented the bistro's rustic-chic decor.

  • Effect:

    The carefully chosen furniture enhanced the bistro's ambiance and comfort, creating a welcoming environment where patrons could relax and enjoy their meals.

Installation and Setup

Concept Development for Urban Cafe

  • Description:

    Our installation team efficiently set up an outdoor patio for a bustling cafe, ensuring that furniture was arranged to maximize seating capacity and optimize traffic flow. Attention to detail was paid to umbrellas, lighting, and planters to create a comfortable and inviting outdoor dining space.

  • Effect:

    The well-organized patio layout allowed the cafe to accommodate more guests during peak hours, resulting in increased revenue and positive feedback from patrons enjoying the al fresco dining experience.
